channel.title: Posts on Aravind's Blog | R | Economics | Finance
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Aravind's Blog | R | Economics | Finance

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to my personal blog. Here, you can find posts related to R, Statistics & Economics. My posts are also published on the official blog of Rsquared Academy and you can find posts on a variety of topics related to R there as well. This blog is built using blogdown and published on Netlify

item.title: Introduction to ggplot2
item.description: Simple Plot # simple plot ggplot(mtcars) + geom_point(aes(disp, mpg)) Addition Function add <- function(a, b) { a + b }
